page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content:
{CHRISTIAN YOUTH CLUB They organised a Father Christmas float and went singing around the christmas tree in December. They meet at the Old Rectory.
{YOUTH CLUB They meet at the Memorial Hall. On club nights they play snooker, darts,table tennis and some special activities are organised. This year the club spent four days on a long boat on a canal.
{WOMEN'S INSTITUTE Meets every month on Thursday in the Memorial Hall. It has many speakers including talks on computers,policedogs,blind dogs,corndollies and cake making.
